TextView.android:text:
This application is to help you navigate through IVR systems of companies.
To find a company, please click 'List of all companies we support'.
Once you've found a company, click their listing. You will be presented with a menu of options. Choose the option that pertains to you (e.g. store hours). Continue until you've obtained what you wanted.
Once you've done some searches, you can retrace them using 'Recent searches'.
You can also save searches and find them under 'Favorite searches'.
